    • Method Detail

      • checkModel

        public boolean checkModel()
        Description copied from interface: TransformationLifecycle
        Checks if the Model (of the context that has been given during construction) is valid for this plugin That means the model gets checked for invalid properties such as unsupported operating systems or architectures
        Returns:
        True if the validation succeeded, false otherwise. Returning false will cause the transformation to fail

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Description copied from interface: TransformationLifecycle
        Has to implement the prepare lifecycle operations

        The Prepare lifecycle phase is described as follows: in this step the plugin processes the graph to transform it in the following step. For example the kubernetes plugin needs to split the graph into container and pods.

        Exceptions have to be handled within the method, The transformation will abort if a runtime exception gets thrown out of the method. To abort the transformation yo have to execute throw new RuntimeException()

      • transform

        public void transform()
        Description copied from interface: TransformationLifecycle
        Has to implement the transform lifecycle operations

        The 'transform' lifecycle phase is described as follows: this is where the real transformation is happening. I.e. the Resources for the target platform get created such as docker images, manifests...

        Exceptions have to be handled within the method, The transformation will abort if a runtime exception gets thrown out of the method. To abort the transformation yo have to execute throw new RuntimeException()

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Description copied from interface: TransformationLifecycle
        Has to implement the clean (cleanup) lifecycle operations

        Exceptions within this operation have to get caught in order to prevent failure of the transformation

      • fillApplications

        public void fillApplications()
        Fills the Applications with the sorted Node structure

      • getFilledApplications

        public java.util.List<Application> getFilledApplications()
